videoGeneration.title: Create Stunning Videos
videoGeneration.description: Turn your ideas into professional AI-generated videos. Powered by Google's latest Veo 3.1 model, create 4-second high-quality videos in minutes with simple text prompts or reference images.
videoGeneration.previewDesc: From prompt to professional video in minutes
videoGeneration.howSubtitle: Create amazing videos in three simple steps
videoGeneration.step1Desc: Start with a text prompt describing your video, or upload a reference image to guide the generation.
videoGeneration.step2Desc: Select resolution (720p or 1080p) and aspect ratio (16:9 or 9:16). Our AI starts creating your video.
videoGeneration.step3Desc: Get professional-quality video in minutes. Download and use anywhere - social media, presentations, or creative projects.
videoGeneration.useCasesSubtitle: Bring your creative vision to life
videoGeneration.useCase1Desc: Create compelling videos for Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts. Stand out with AI-generated content.
videoGeneration.useCase2Desc: Quickly generate product demos, promotional videos, and ad content without expensive production costs.
videoGeneration.useCase3Desc: Turn your artistic ideas into reality. Perfect for storyboards, concept visualization, and experimental art.
videoGeneration.benefit1Desc: Google Veo 3.1 delivers studio-grade video quality with realistic motion and detail
videoGeneration.benefit2Desc: Generate videos in minutes, not hours. Skip complex editing and rendering
videoGeneration.benefit3Desc: Describe anything and watch it come to life. No filming equipment or actors needed
videoGeneration.benefit4Desc: Choose between 720p and 1080p for crisp, professional results
videoGeneration.benefit5Desc: 16:9 for YouTube, 9:16 for vertical social media - we support both
videoGeneration.benefit6Desc: Create unlimited videos at a fraction of traditional production costs
videoGeneration.finalSubtitle: Join creators generating thousands of AI videos daily

oneShot.title: Edit Images
oneShot.subtitle: Just
oneShot.description: No complex tools, no layers, no hassle. Just tell the AI what you want and watch your image transform in seconds. The fastest way to edit images.
oneShot.demoSubtitle: Type what you want, get it instantly
oneShot.step1Desc: Drag and drop any image you want to edit. Works with photos, graphics, screenshots - anything.
oneShot.step2Desc: Type a simple prompt like 'make the sky sunset orange' or 'add a mountain in the background'. That's it.
oneShot.step3Desc: AI understands your intent and applies the edit perfectly. Download the result instantly.
oneShot.examplesSubtitle: Get inspired by what others create
oneShot.useCase1Desc: Quick touch-ups for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn posts. No need to open Photoshop for simple edits.
oneShot.useCase2Desc: Fix slides, adjust colors, remove unwanted objects from presentation images in seconds.
oneShot.useCase3Desc: Enhance vacation photos, fix lighting issues, or add creative effects to your memories.
oneShot.feature1Desc: Get edits in 3 seconds, not 3 minutes
oneShot.feature2Desc: No tutorials, no mastering complex tools
oneShot.feature3Desc: Just type what you want in simple language
oneShot.feature5Desc: AI knows exactly what to change and what to keep
oneShot.finalSubtitle: Join creators who are 10x faster with one-shot AI editing

multiImage.title: Edit
multiImage.description: Upload entire folders and apply the same AI edit to all images simultaneously. Batch remove backgrounds, resize, color adjust, or any transformation you need. Save hours of repetitive work.
multiImage.demoSubtitle: One prompt, hundreds of images processed
multiImage.howSubtitle: Edit hundreds of images in 3 steps
multiImage.step1Desc: Drag and drop entire folders or select multiple images (up to 500 per batch). Supports JPG, PNG, WebP.
multiImage.step2Desc: Describe the edit once: 'remove background', 'resize to 1080x1080', 'make colors warmer'. AI applies to all images.
multiImage.step3Desc: Wait a few minutes while AI processes everything in parallel. Download all edited images as a ZIP file. Done!
multiImage.tasksSubtitle: Save time with these automated workflows
multiImage.task1Desc: Remove backgrounds from entire product catalogs
multiImage.task2Desc: Resize all images to exact dimensions for your website
multiImage.task3Desc: Fix white balance across an entire photo shoot
multiImage.task4Desc: Add logo/watermark to hundreds of images
multiImage.task5Desc: Batch convert JPG to PNG or WebP
multiImage.useCase1Desc: Process thousands of product photos. Remove backgrounds, standardize sizes, maintain brand consistency across catalogs.
multiImage.useCase2Desc: Apply same color grading to entire wedding albums. Batch resize event photos for client delivery.
multiImage.useCase3Desc: Prepare hundreds of posts at once. Add filters, crop to platform specs, batch add branding elements.
multiImage.useCase4Desc: Process entire property photo shoots. Enhance lighting, straighten horizons, apply HDR effects to all listing photos.
multiImage.useCase5Desc: Prepare assets for projects. Convert formats, resize for different platforms, apply consistent adjustments.
multiImage.useCase6Desc: Batch process YouTube thumbnails, blog post images, course materials. Maintain consistent branding across content.
multiImage.feature2Desc: Real-time progress bar and estimated completion time
multiImage.feature4Desc: Drag and drop entire folders, maintain structure
multiImage.feature6Desc: Pause and resume large batch processing tasks
multiImage.finalTitle: Ready to Save Hours of Work?
multiImage.finalSubtitle: Process hundreds of images with one click. Stop wasting time on repetitive edits.
multiImage.description1: Nano Banana supports processing multiple reference images simultaneously, allowing you to create more complex and refined edits. This is essential for advanced workflows that require combining multiple elements or styles.
multiImage.description2: Upload multiple images as references, and AI will understand the relationships between them, creating coherent results that fuse all inputs.
multiImage.batchProcessingDesc: Process multiple images simultaneously for improved efficiency
multiImage.styleBlendingDesc: Combine style elements from multiple reference images
multiImage.complexEditsDesc: Handle advanced tasks requiring multiple inputs

styleTransfer.title: Style Transfer
styleTransfer.description: Transform your images into different artistic styles while maintaining core composition
styleTransfer.uploadImageFirst: Please upload a reference image first

naturalLanguage.description1: Nano Banana's natural language editing feature uses advanced AI models to understand your text instructions. Simply describe the changes you want in simple Chinese or English, and AI will automatically apply these edits.
naturalLanguage.description2: No need to learn complex editing tools or parameters. Tell AI 'change background to sunset beach' or 'make the person wear a red jacket', and it will understand and execute.
naturalLanguage.smartDescription: AI understands context and nuances, like conversing with a professional editor
naturalLanguage.instantDescription: See your edits applied to images in seconds
naturalLanguage.easyDescription: No technical knowledge required, anyone can create professional-grade edits
